name: Samarjit Roy
desc: NITS Hacks provided an incredible platform to challenge my creative and problem-solving skills in UI/UX. The intense competition and collaborative environment pushed me to innovate, and winning the track was a proud moment. It’s an amazing event for anyone looking to grow and showcase their talents.

name: Gracie G Rabha
desc: I'm thrilled to share my journey as the runner-up in the UI/UX track at NITS Hacks 6.0, where I designed a fun and engaging app showcasing Super Mario's adventures. This experience allowed me to refine my UI/UX skills, tackle creative challenges, and develop solutions for a seamless user experience.

name: Amit Ranjan Das
desc: We, the Team Binary Pixel Labs (BPL) would like to extend our heartfelt gratitude to the organizers of NITS HACK 6.0, for hosting such an incredible event. The hackathon provided an exceptional platform for innovation, collaboration, and skill development, allowing participants to push their creative boundaries and tackle real-world challenges.

name: Rajdeep Sarkar
desc: I’m proud to have won the UI/UX track at NITS Hacks 6.0 with my Super Mario-themed app! The project helped me sharpen my design skills and create a fun, easy-to-use experience. Grateful to Nits Hacks 6.0, NIT Silchar, for the chance. Excited for what’s next!

name: Sohail Kazi
desc: Good competition and interesting problem statements. Received the prize money within a few weeks.

name: Piyush Chatterjee
desc: Winning the UI/UX track at NITS Hacks 7.0 was such an amazing experience! The Star Wars theme made it super fun, creative, and flashy to work on. I learned a lot about designing user-friendly interfaces,  and bringing ideas to life in a short time. It was a really exciting and memorable journey that helped me grow as a designer and have a great time doing it.

name: Subhajyoti Dey
desc: Winning the software track at Nits Hacks 7.0 was an incredible moment for our team Directionless. We put a ton of hard work and dedication into our project, and seeing it recognized as the best in the software category feels amazing. This victory shows what we can achieve when we collaborate and push our limits.
